sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import illustration from '../assets/illustration.jpg' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { fetchData } from '../helpers' const Intro = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const createAccount = (event) => { event.preventDefault() localStorage.setItem('userName', event.target.elements.name.value) toast.success(`Welcome, ${fetchData('userName')}`) navigate('/') } return (

Take Control of Your Money

Personal budgeting is the secret to financial freedom. Start your journey today.

) } export default Intro
